data.eml:eml: One generic synonym and one new species of Phlaeothripidae from India (Thysanoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tyagi, Kaomud, Singha, Devkant, Saha, Goutam Kumar, Kumar, Vikas (2018): One generic synonym and one new species of Phlaeothripidae from India (Thysanoptera). ZooKeys 786: 59-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.786.28332, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.786.28332
